title: Verstappen’s Psychologist, Visma’s Nutritionist, Ineos’ Engineers: Red Bull-Bora Brings Big Brains to Bid for Dominance
content:
'We need to invest in the details': Roglič's crew leverages Red Bull's portfolio of performance experts in bid for 'super team' status.

Read the full article at Verstappen’s Psychologist, Visma’s Nutritionist, Ineos’ Engineers: Red Bull-Bora Brings Big Brains to Bid for Dominance on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
